content: the ade beanie is a super fun easy pattern ideal for anyone ranging from beginners to more experienced knitters made using some super chunky weight yarn this beanie works up really quickly and can be made in just a few hours the name ade pronounced ah day is a traditional yoruba word which translates to crown or royalty and was inspired by the crown like effect created by the combination of textures in this design the techniques involved in the making of this hat include working in the round the knit stitch purl stitch simple decrease and working with the magic loop technique / double pointed needles to shape the crown this pattern is available in an adult size only and fits the average adult sized head if you decide to make this beanie please share your photos with me on instagram and facebook with the hashtags #adebeanie and #therookiehooker and tag me @therookiehooker for any questions or issues with the pattern feel free to contact me email therookiehooker@gmail com instagram @therookiehooker facebook @therookiehooker note the beanie shown in the first photo is made using wool and the gang s crazy sexy wool in the color way love heart pink from the funfetti range
